text: Great clinic with an empathetic doctor and friendly receptionists. Dr Clyde Ong is a genuine nice guy who takes the time to show compassion and empathy. He's also knowledgeable and is happy to answer questions related to my presenting complaints and the prescribed medication.

I am so happy to have rediscovered our trusted family doctor at his new clinic (My Family Clinic - St George) today! My family and I had the pleasure of seeing him for two years, and he has consistently demonstrated exceptional care by giving clear explanations and medication guidance that have addressed various health concerns. Thank you, Dr. Clyde, for being a trustworthy and caring family physician.

Called in to make an appointment and the clinic staff was extremely rude and giving contradicting information. I don’t think it’s safe to visit the clinic if the clinic staff does not provide accurate information and giving an attitude with rude tone over the phone. I will rather travel further to a clinic where I feel safe and comfortable to get treatment.
My maid went to this clinic for usual checkup, charge $58 is very expensive. Tiong Bahru clinic charges $36. We were so surprised by the charges.

Best GP clinic we have used in Singapore. Reception staff were friendly and helpful, that alone makes it truly remarkable. Dr polite, not patronising and genuinely interested. I am torn between recommending this clinic too highly as I don't want it to get too busy!
